frangi_net.info_mode: vanilla: original version, guided: additional layer to reduce noise
frangi_net.info_gpus: if frangi-gpu is selected, enter number of the gpus to be user
frangi_net.info_image: image and binary must have the same suffix-filename to be matched by the network
frangi_net.info_threshold_metric: minimal f1 score for which threshols shall be stored (used later for binarization)
frangi_net.info_rotate_images: height, width and depth will be cropped down to smallest dimension
frangi_net.info_mask: binary image, only areas markes as true/1 are considered by the network
